front.title: IANA Allocation Guidelines for TCP and UDP Port Numbers

abstract.t: This document defines the IANA guidelines for registering new port number values for use with the Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) and User Datagram Protocol (UDP). It provides clear processes for the TCP and UDP port number registries, important for their long-term management. It updates RFC2780 by replacing Sections 8 and 9.1 of that RFC.
